name: Zi Si Noapte
description:
Zi Si Noapte is a 2D Platformer that takes place in 1477 A.D. in the country of Wallachia, under the rule of Vlad the Impaler. Vlad the Impaler terrifies the people of Wallachia, where one day they imprisoned a peasant named Florin to impale him for no reason. While imprisoned, lighting struck through the window of the prison Florin is in. Striking him and giving him peg teeth, super strength, and a thirst for blood. Florin broke out of his chains and now is trying to escape Vlad the Impaler's Castle and kill Vlad the Impaler.

Zi Si Noapte was made for the Daily Click Night and Day Halloween Competition.

Credits:

Game Design, Programming, Art, and Animation: Nicholas Walton

Music: Clickteam

SFXs: Clickteam and Wondershare Filmora 

Zi Si Noapte Keyboard Version Controls:  

Arrow Keys: Move & Move Cursor

Z: Punch

X: Jump & Select Objects

C: Open Doors

Spacebar: Pause

Zi Si Noapte Xbox Version Controls:  

Left Analog Stick: Move & Move Cursor

X: Punch

A: Jump & Select Objects

Y: Open Doors

Start: Pause

I hope you enjoy Zi Si Noapte and I hope you look forward to my future games and don't forget to comment and review! Also good luck to everyone else that's in the Competition!

Warning: You can only use an Xbox Controller with the Xbox Controller Controls Version of Zi Si Noapte. And the Xbox Controller used to play the Xbox Controller Controls Version of Zi Si Noapte must be wired, The game can't be played wirelessly nor use the Xbox Wireless Adaptor. With an Xbox One or Xbox Series X Controller just plug in a USB B Micro or a USB C Cord respectively into your Xbox One and/or Xbox Series X Controller and into your computer.
